name: XKCD
author: BenCos18
description: A comprehensive XKCD comic lookup cog for Red Discord Bot that allows users to search, browse, and discover XKCD comics directly in Discord.
install_msg: Thank you for installing the XKCD cog! Use `[p]help XKCD` to see all available commands.
end_user_data_statement: This cog does not store any end user data.
